Package linefit.FitAlgorithms

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    LinearFitFactory
    The Abstract class for the Linear Fit Algorithms that allows the user to select the the fit algorithm during fun time
    LinearFitStrategy
    The Abstract class for the Linear Fit Algorithms where the algorithm is actually implemented.
    PartialDerivativeMinimizationFactory
    The Chi Square Fit Factory class that is used to create the Chi Squared Data so that it can be done in a generic way during run time, allowing the user to change the algorithm
    QuadraticApproximationFactory
    The Quadratic Approximation Factory class that is used to create the Quadratic Approximation Strategy so that it can be done in a generic way during run time, allowing the user to change the algorithm This algorithm makes use of the quadratic equation to calculate the Chi Squared values for the data with given slopes and intercepts Chi Squared (S) is written as: S1 = S0 + alpha(b1 - b0)^2 + beta(m1 - m0)^2 + 2gamma(b1 - b0)(m1 - m0), where S1 is the Chi squared being calculated with the given m1 and b1 and S0 is the Chi Square of the calculated starting point and m0 and b0 are the calculated starting slope and intercept
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    FitType
    This enumeration is used to keep track of the FitType and handles its basic functions that allow it to be treated as a string or a number NONE - Don't show fit REGULAR - Show fit but don't factor errors into the fit X_ERROR - Factor horizontal errors into the fit only Y_ERROR - Factor vertical errors into the fit only BOTH_ERRORS - Factor both horizontal errors and vertical errors into the fit
    FixedVariable
    This enumeration is used to keep track of what variable is fixed in the LinearFitData we have for a given DataSet 0 - Nothing is fixed.
